channel.title: R on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in R on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: Advent of Code 2020 — days 06–08
item.description: Ok, now that today’s puzzles are solved, I can go back and look at solutions to the previous days. Today, I will show you my solutions for days six through eight. There is some fun stuff in these days, with graph algorithms, memorisation, and virtual machines, the latter which I found particularly fun to play with.
